annotations.label: Page-header
annotations.text: EN

annotations.label: Page-header
annotations.text: Official Journal of the European Communities

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: COMMISSION DECISION

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: of 10 May 2000

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: on publication of the references of standards EN 1459:1999' Safety of industrial trucks - Self-propelled variable reach trucks' and EN 1726-1:1999' Safety of industrial trucks - Self-propelled trucks up to and including 10 000 kg capacity and industrial tractors with a drawbar pull up to and including 20 000 N - Part 1: General requirements'
annotations.translation: 关于发布参考标准 EN 1459:1999 ”工业卡车安全 – 自走式可变前移卡车“ 和 EN 1726-1:1999 ”工业卡车安全 – 载重量可达 10,000 千克的自走式卡车及牵引力可达 20,000 牛顿的工业牵引车 – 第 1 部分：一般要求"

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: (notified under document number C(2000) 1174)

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: (Text with EEA relevance)

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES,

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community,
annotations.translation: 考虑到《建立欧洲共同体条约》，

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Having regard to Directive 98/37/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 22 June 1998 on the approximation of the laws of the Member States relating to machinery (¹), as amended by Directive 98/79/EC (²),
annotations.translation: 考虑到经第 98/79/EC 号指令 (²) 修正的 1998 年 6 月 22 日欧洲议会和理事会关于成员国机械相关法律近似化的第 98/37/EC 号指令 (¹)，

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Having regard to the opinion of the Committee set up by Directive 98/34/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 22 June 1998 laying down a procedure for the provision of information in the field of technical standards and regulations (³), as amended by Directive 98/48/EC (⁴),
annotations.translation: 考虑到经第 98/48/EC 号指令 (⁴) 修正的1998 年 6 月 22 日欧洲议会和理事会第 98/34/EC 号指令设立的委员会的意见，该委员会制定了技术标准和条例领域信息的提供程序 (³)，

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Whereas:

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (1) Article 2 of Directive 98/37/EC, as amended, provides that machinery may be placed on the market and put into service only if it does not endanger the health or safety of persons and, where appropriate, domestic animals or property, when properly installed and maintained and used for its intended purpose.
annotations.translation: (1) 经修正的第 98/37/EC 号指令第 2 条规定，机器只有在正确地安装和维护并用于其预定目的时，在不危及人的健康或安全，适当情况下也不危及家畜或财产安全时，才可投放市场并投入使用。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (2) Machinery which conforms to harmonised standards the references of which have been published in the Official Journal of the European Communities is presumed to satisfy the essential health and safety requirements referred to in Article 3 of Directive 98/37/EC, as amended.
annotations.translation: (2) 其参考文献已在《欧洲共同体官方公报》上公布的符合协调标准的机械，视为符合经修正的第 98/37/EC 号指令第 3 条所述的基本健康和安全要求。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (3) Member States are required to publish the references of the national standards which transpose the harmonised standards.
annotations.translation: (3) 成员国必须公布采用协调标准的国家标准的参考文献。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (4) Harmonised standards EN 1459:1999' Safety of industrial trucks Self-propelled variable reach trucks' and EN 1726-1:1999' Safety of industrial trucks Self-propelled trucks up to and including 10 000 kg capacity and industrial tractors with a drawbar pull up to and including 20 000 N Part 1: General require ments' deal with equipment which presents a special risk to the operator, namely the risk of being crushed
annotations.translation: (4) 协调标准 EN 1459:1999 ”工业卡车安全 自走式可变前移卡车“和 EN 1726-1:1999 "工业卡车安全 载重量可达 10,000 千克的自走式卡车和牵引力可达 20,000 牛顿的工业牵引车 第 1 部分：一般要求”涉及对操作员有特殊风险的设备，即被挤压的风险

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: between the ground and the truck in the event of the truck accidentally tipping over.
annotations.translation: 在地面和卡车之间，以防卡车意外翻倒。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (5) In view of the large number of accidents which have occurred in their territory, several Member States have taken the view that, although they are correct, the abovementioned standards do not cover all the essential requirements of the Directive and in particular the risk of the operator being crushed.
annotations.translation: (5) 鉴于在其领土上发生的大量事故，一些成员国认为，尽管上述标准是正确的，但并未涵盖指令的所有基本要求，特别是操作员被挤压的风险。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (6) It is necessary to draw attention to this potential hazard which is not referred to in the abovementioned standards.
annotations.translation: (6) 有必要提请注意上述标准中未提及的这种潜在危险。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (7) Pending amendment of the standards, it is essential, for the sake of efficacy, to take account now of the short comings, which nonetheless do not affect the present contents of the standards.
annotations.translation: (7) 在修正标准之前，为了有效起见，现在必须考虑到不足之处，尽管这些不足之处并不影响标准的现有内容。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (8) It is therefore necessary to publish standards EN 1726-1:1999 and EN 1459:1999 together with an appropriate warning and an indication that a standardisation mandate must be given to the European Committee for Standardisation (CEN) to amend the standards,
annotations.translation: (8) 因此，有必要公布 EN 1726-1:1999 和 EN 1459:1999 标准，以及适当的警告，并说明必须向欧洲标准化委员会 (CEN) 授予标准化授权，以修正这些标准，

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: HAS ADOPTED THIS DECISION:

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Article 1

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: The publication attached to this Decision, is made in accordance with Article 5(2) of Directive 98/37/EC, as amended, of the following harmonised standards: EN 1459:1999' Safety of industrial trucks - Self-propelled variable reach trucks' and EN 1726-1:1999' Safety of industrial trucks Self-propelled trucks up to and including 10 000 kg capacity and industrial tractors with a drawbar pull up to and including 20 000 N - Part 1: General requirements' and shall be accompanied by the following warning:
annotations.translation: 本决定所附出版物是根据经修正的第 98/37/EC 号指令第 5(2) 条以及以下协调标准制定的： EN 1459:1999 “工业卡车安全 – 自走式可变前移卡车”和 EN 1726-1:1999 “工业卡车安全 载重量可达 10,000 千克的自走式卡车和牵引力可达括 20,000 牛顿的工业牵引车 – 第 1 部分：一般要求”，并应附有以下警告：

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: 'Users of the standard are informed that the standard does not cover the risks to which the operator is exposed in the event of the truck accidentally tipping over. The standard does not give a presumption of conformity in that respect.'
annotations.translation: “该标准的用户被告知，该标准不涵盖卡车意外翻倒时操作员面临的风险。该标准并未在这方面给出符合性推定。”
